text: Hugely proud of the work our small team at the Spinoff has produced over the last week as we all try to come to terms with something so awful. Capped by this graceful, restrained, eloquent account by @madmanchap of the prime minister's seven days.
author: toby_etc

text: Great that @smh have taken this powerful speech to a wider audience. Pisspoor that they've copy-pasted the Spinoff's transcription (imperfect and abridged) and put a terrible headline at the top of it.
author: toby_etc

text:
Two extraordinary speeches. Jacinda Ardern: https://thespinoff.co.nz/society/19-03-2019/we-cannot-know-your-grief-but-we-can-walk-with-you-at-every-stage/ …
And Imam Gamal Fouda:
author: toby_etc

text: Now more than six days of silence from Zuckerberg and New Zealand advertisers are quitting, investment funds dumping Facebook shares.
author: toby_etc

text: Mark Zuckerberg, four days on, your silence on Christchurch is deafening.
author: toby_etc

text: Has Facebook chairman & CEO Mark Zuckerberg yet said anything at all, anywhere, about the murder of 50 people live-streamed on his platform?
author: toby_etc

text: "He is a terrorist. He is a criminal. He is an extremist. But he will, when I speak, be nameless." - Jacinda Ardern
author: toby_etc

text: Ardern: “We cannot sit back and accept these platforms just exist, that what is said on them is not the responsibility of the place they are published. They are the publisher not just the postman. They cannot have the profits without the responsibility.”
author: toby_etc

text: Knew I could count on you
author: toby_etc

text: Hi @jack. This tweet and account remain live three days after I reported them. This is the norm. Your "love" is hollow. You and your Silicon Valley charlatan mates are a massive part of the problem.
author: toby_etc

text: Good. Glad he's being charged. Does this also mean Mark Zuckerberg, Larry Page, etc, will be arrested if they try to come to New Zealand?
author: toby_etc

text:
What it means to be a Muslim New Zealander in 2019. 
Thank you, @faisalhalabi
author: toby_etc

text: "We will continue to maintain a presence at all mosques across NZ," said police yesterday. I hope they've also got a presence at all gun shops. Or better still, make them close their doors.
author: toby_etc
